about_the_game: Tired to Fall is a puzzle-platformer where you collect, launch, and transform leaves into platforms to help a little red leaf climb back to its tree. Jump, glide, and solve puzzles in this demo through 11 levels filled with spiky chestnuts and cannon-mushrooms. Can you grab all the golden chestnuts?
detailed_description: Tired to Fall is a puzzle-platformer where you collect, launch, and transform leaves into platforms to help a little red leaf climb back to its tree. Jump, glide, and solve puzzles in this demo through 11 levels filled with spiky chestnuts and cannon-mushrooms. Can you grab all the golden chestnuts?
name: Tired to Fall Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Tired to Fall is a puzzle-platformer where you collect, launch, and transform leaves into platforms to help a little red leaf climb back to its tree. Jump, glide, and solve puzzles in this demo through 11 levels filled with spiky chestnuts and cannon-mushrooms. Can you grab all the golden chestnuts?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
